xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/648295-Affinity 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/wPKToMHI61PdYdcai9O8mGBxx95.jpg Roma, a humble soul from the rural country, embarks on a trip to the city where she has been living for the past year and a half. While starting her new life in the city she meets Lydia, a witty biochemistry student, who soon became her lover. On their last night together, Roma and Lydia stroll around the desolate city. Unable to hail a cab or catch a bus, they are forced to face the flaws of their love, discussing their opposing schools of thought and the reality of their withering relationship. Affinity
